title: Official ‘Switch to Android’ iOS app may import your iCloud data to Google Photos
content:
Google’s upcoming “Switch to Android” app for iOS may be able to import data from your iCloud directly into Google Photos.

more…

The post Official ‘Switch to Android’ iOS app may import your iCloud data to Google Photos appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google's upcoming "Switch to Android" app for iOS may be able to import data from your iCloud directly into Google Photos.
